name: RIS_STUDY_NOTES
description: This table contains the notes entered for a radiology order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for study notes associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STUDY_NOTES_ID
columns.description: The ID of the study notes for an order.
